   178â†’interface QuoteContext {
   179â†’  hour: number;
   180â†’  dayOfWeek: number;        // 0=å‘¨æ—¥, 1=å‘¨ä¸€, ...
   181â†’  dayOfMonth: number;
   182â†’  month: number;
   183â†’  streak: number;
   184â†’  checkedIn: boolean;
   185â†’  weekProgress: number;     // 0-1
   186â†’  subscribedSkills: string[];  // ç”¨æˆ·è®¢é˜…çš„ Skill
   187â†’}
   188â†’
   189â†’function selectQuote(context: QuoteContext): { text: string; author: string | null } {
   190â†’  const {
   191â†’    hour, dayOfWeek, dayOfMonth, month,
   192â†’    streak, checkedIn, weekProgress, subscribedSkills
   193â†’  } = context;
   194â†’
   195â†’  let candidatePool: Array<{ text: string; author: string | null; weight: number }> = [];
   196â†’
   197â†’  // 1. å‘¨æœŸæ€§åè¨€ä¼˜å…ˆï¼ˆç‰¹æ®Šæ—¶é—´ç‚¹ï¼‰
   198â†’  if (dayOfWeek === 1) {
   199â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERIODIC_QUOTES.monday.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 10 })));
   200â†’  } else if (dayOfWeek === 5) {
   201â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERIODIC_QUOTES.friday.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 10 })));
   202â†’  } else if (dayOfWeek === 0 || dayOfWeek === 6) {
   203â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERIODIC_QUOTES.weekend.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 10 })));
   204â†’  }
   205â†’
   206â†’  if (dayOfMonth <= 3) {
   207â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERIODIC_QUOTES.month_start.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 12 })));
   208â†’  } else if (dayOfMonth >= 28) {
   209â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERIODIC_QUOTES.month_end.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 12 })));
   210â†’  }
   211â†’
   212â†’  // 2. åŸºäºç”¨æˆ·è®¢é˜… Skill é€‰æ‹©
   213â†’  if (subscribedSkills.includes('jungian')) {
   214â†’    candidatePool.push(...SELF_AWARENESS_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 8 })));
   215â†’  }
   216â†’
   217â†’  // 3. åŸºäºç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€é€‰æ‹©
   218â†’  if (streak >= 7) {
   219â†’    candidatePool.push(...PERSISTENCE_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 8 })));
   220â†’  }
   221â†’
   222â†’  if (!checkedIn && hour >= 6 && hour < 12) {
   223â†’    candidatePool.push(...ACTION_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 8 })));
   224â†’  }
   225â†’
   226â†’  if (weekProgress >= 0.7) {
   227â†’    candidatePool.push(...GROWTH_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 6 })));
   228â†’  }
   229â†’
   230â†’  if (weekProgress < 0.3 && dayOfWeek >= 4) {
   231â†’    candidatePool.push(...BREAKTHROUGH_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 8 })));
   232â†’  }
   233â†’
   234â†’  if (hour >= 20 || dayOfWeek === 0 || dayOfWeek === 6) {
   235â†’    candidatePool.push(...REST_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 5 })));
   236â†’  }
   237â†’
   238â†’  // 4. é»˜è®¤æ± è¡¥å……
   239â†’  candidatePool.push(...VISION_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 3 })));
   240â†’  candidatePool.push(...SELF_AWARENESS_QUOTES.map(q => ({ ...q, weight: 3 })));
   241â†’
   242â†’  // 5. åŠ æƒéšæœºé€‰æ‹©ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨æ—¥æœŸä½œä¸ºç§å­ï¼ŒåŒä¸€å¤©è¿”å›ç›¸åŒåè¨€ï¼‰
   243â†’  const seed = new Date().toDateString();
   244â†’  const totalWeight = candidatePool.reduce((sum, q) => sum + q.weight, 0);
   245â†’  const targetWeight = (hashCode(seed) % totalWeight + totalWeight) % totalWeight;
   246â†’
   247â†’  let cumulative = 0;
   248â†’  for (const quote of candidatePool) {
   249â†’    cumulative += quote.weight;
   250â†’    if (cumulative >= targetWeight) {
   251â†’      return { text: quote.text, author: quote.author };
   252â†’    }
   253â†’  }
   254â†’
   255â†’  return VISION_QUOTES[0];
   256â†’}
   257â†’
   258â†’function hashCode(str: string): number {
   259â†’  let hash = 0;
   260â†’  for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i++) {
   261â†’    hash = ((hash << 5) - hash) + str.charCodeAt(i);
   262â†’    hash |= 0;
   263â†’  }
   264â†’  return hash;
   265â†’}

   799â†’export function useDashboard() {

   808â†’
   809â†’  const checkIn = async () => {
   810â†’    // ä¹è§‚æ›´æ–°
   811â†’    mutate(
   812â†’      {

   815â†’      },

   818â†’

   824â†’  const toggleLever = async (leverId: string) => {
   825â†’    // ä¹è§‚æ›´æ–°
   826â†’    const newLevers = data!.lifecoach.todayLevers.map(l =>
   827â†’      l.id === leverId ? { ...l, completed: !l.completed } : l
   828â†’    );

   831â†’      false

   835â†’    mutate();

   865â†’    }

   214â†’            score = daily_fortune["score"]

   240â†’    # Discover Layer (æ¨èæœªè®¢é˜…çš„ Skills)
   241â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   242â†’
   243â†’    # è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥ä» skill registry è·å–æ¨èï¼Œç›®å‰è¿”å›ç©º
   244â†’    discover = []
   245â†’
   246â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   247â†’    # Response
   248â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   249â†’

   264â†’        },
   265â†’    }
   266â†’
   267â†’
   268â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   269â†’# Lever Toggle Endpoint
   270â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   271â†’
   272â†’@router.patch("/lever/{lever_id}")
   273â†’async def toggle_lever(
   274â†’    lever_id: str,
   275â†’    current_user: CurrentUser = Depends(get_current_user)
   276â†’):
   277â†’    """
   278â†’    åˆ‡æ¢ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€
   279â†’
   280â†’    æ›´æ–° skills.lifecoach.today_levers ä¸­å¯¹åº”é¡¹çš„ completed çŠ¶æ€
   281â†’    """
   282â†’    user_id = current_user.user_id
   283â†’
   284â†’    # è·å–å½“å‰ lifecoach æ•°æ®
   285â†’    lifecoach_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach")
   286â†’    today_levers = lifecoach_data.get("today_levers", [])
   287â†’

   289â†’    found = False
   290â†’    for lever in today_levers:
   291â†’        if isinstance(lever, dict) and lever.get("id") == lever_id:
   292â†’            lever["completed"] = not lever.get("completed", False)
   293â†’            found = True
   294â†’            break
   295â†’
   296â†’    if not found:
   297â†’        return {"success": False, "error": "Lever not found"}
   298â†’
   299â†’    # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°
   300â†’    lifecoach_data["today_levers"] = today_levers
   301â†’    await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach", lifecoach_data)
   302â†’
   303â†’    # è®¡ç®—è¿›åº¦
   304â†’    completed_count = len([l for l in today_levers if isinstance(l, dict) and l.get("completed")])
   305â†’    total_count = len(today_levers)
   306â†’
   307â†’    return {
   308â†’        "success": True,
   309â†’        "data": {
   310â†’            "lever": {"id": lever_id, "completed": not found or lever.get("completed", False)},
   311â†’            "progress": {
   312â†’                "completed": completed_count,
   313â†’                "total": total_count,
   314â†’                "percentage": round(completed_count / total_count * 100) if total_count > 0 else 0,
   315â†’            },
   316â†’            "allCompleted": completed_count == total_count,
   317â†’        },

   319â†’
   320â†’
   321â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   322â†’# Rock Toggle Endpoint
   323â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   324â†’
   325â†’@router.patch("/rock/{rock_id}")
   326â†’async def toggle_rock(
   327â†’    rock_id: str,
   328â†’    current_user: CurrentUser = Depends(get_current_user)
   329â†’):
   330â†’    """
   331â†’    åˆ‡æ¢æœ¬å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€
   332â†’
   333â†’    æ›´æ–° vibe.target.goals æˆ– skills.lifecoach.week_rocks ä¸­å¯¹åº”é¡¹çš„ completed çŠ¶æ€
   334â†’    """
   335â†’    user_id = current_user.user_id
   336â†’
   337â†’    # ä¼˜å…ˆä» vibe.target è·å–
   338â†’    vibe_target = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_vibe_target(user_id)
   339â†’    goals = vibe_target.get("goals", [])
   340â†’
   341â†’    # æ‰¾åˆ°å¹¶åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€
   342â†’    found = False
   343â†’    for goal in goals:
   344â†’        if isinstance(goal, dict) and goal.get("id") == rock_id:
   345â†’            goal["completed"] = not goal.get("completed", False)
   346â†’            found = True

   350â†’        # ä¿å­˜åˆ° vibe.target
   351â†’        vibe_target["goals"] = goals
   352â†’        await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_vibe_target(user_id, vibe_target)
   353â†’    else:
   354â†’        # å›é€€åˆ° lifecoach.week_rocks
   355â†’        lifecoach_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach")
   356â†’        week_rocks = lifecoach_data.get("week_rocks", [])
   357â†’

"""
Dashboard API Route - Dashboard æ•°æ®èšåˆç«¯ç‚¹

ä» UnifiedProfileRepository è·å–çœŸå®ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸ä½¿ç”¨ä»»ä½• Mock Dataã€‚

æ•°æ®æ¥æº:
- vibe.target: åŒ—ææ˜Ÿã€ç›®æ ‡ã€ä¸“æ³¨ç‚¹
- skills.lifecoach: å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ã€ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†
- skills.bazi: è¿åŠ¿æ•°æ®
- èŠ‚æ°”: æ ¹æ®æ—¥æœŸè®¡ç®—
"""

import logging
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import Optional
from uuid import UUID

from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends

from services.identity import get_current_user, CurrentUser
from stores.unified_profile_repo import UnifiedProfileRepository

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

router = APIRouter(prefix="/dashboard", tags=["Dashboard"])


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Solar Term Calculation
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

SOLAR_TERMS = [
    (1, 5, "å°å¯’"), (1, 20, "å¤§å¯’"),
    (2, 4, "ç«‹æ˜¥"), (2, 19, "é›¨æ°´"),
    (3, 6, "æƒŠè›°"), (3, 21, "æ˜¥åˆ†"),
    (4, 5, "æ¸…æ˜"), (4, 20, "è°·é›¨"),
    (5, 6, "ç«‹å¤"), (5, 21, "å°æ»¡"),
    (6, 6, "èŠ’ç§"), (6, 21, "å¤è‡³"),
    (7, 7, "å°æš‘"), (7, 23, "å¤§æš‘"),
    (8, 8, "ç«‹ç§‹"), (8, 23, "å¤„æš‘"),
    (9, 8, "ç™½éœ²"), (9, 23, "ç§‹åˆ†"),
    (10, 8, "å¯’éœ²"), (10, 24, "éœœé™"),
    (11, 8, "ç«‹å†¬"), (11, 22, "å°é›ª"),
    (12, 7, "å¤§é›ª"), (12, 22, "å†¬è‡³"),
]


def get_current_solar_term() -> str:
    """æ ¹æ®å½“å‰æ—¥æœŸè·å–èŠ‚æ°”"""
    now = datetime.now()
    month = now.month
    day = now.day

    current_term = "å†¬è‡³"  # é»˜è®¤å€¼

    for m, d, term in SOLAR_TERMS:
        if month > m or (month == m and day >= d):
            current_term = term
        else:
            break

    return current_term


def get_greeting(display_name: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
    """æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´ç”Ÿæˆé—®å€™è¯­"""
    hour = datetime.now().hour

    if hour < 6:
        greeting = "å¤œæ·±äº†"
    elif hour < 12:
        greeting = "æ—©ä¸Šå¥½"
    elif hour < 18:
        greeting = "ä¸‹åˆå¥½"
    else:
        greeting = "æ™šä¸Šå¥½"

    if display_name:
        greeting = f"{greeting}ï¼Œ{display_name}"

    return greeting


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Dashboard Endpoint
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@router.get("")
async def get_dashboard(current_user: CurrentUser = Depends(get_current_user)):
    """
    è·å– Dashboard æ•°æ®

    æ•°æ®æ¥æºï¼š
    - ambient: é—®å€™è¯­ã€èŠ‚æ°”ï¼ˆå®æ—¶è®¡ç®—ï¼‰
    - lifecoach: åŒ—ææ˜Ÿã€å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ã€ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†ï¼ˆæ¥è‡ª vibe.target + skills.lifecoachï¼‰
    - mySkills: å…«å­—è¿åŠ¿ç­‰ï¼ˆæ¥è‡ª skills.baziï¼‰
    - status: ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ¥è‡ª preferencesï¼‰

    Returns:
        DashboardDTO æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®
    """
    user_id = current_user.user_id

    # å¹¶è¡Œè·å–æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
    profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
    account = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_account_full(user_id)
    vibe_target = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_vibe_target(user_id)
    lifecoach_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach")
    bazi_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "bazi")
    subscribed_ids = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_subscribed_skill_ids(user_id)

    display_name = account.get("display_name")
    now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)

    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    # Ambient Layer
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    ambient = {
        "greeting": get_greeting(display_name),
        "quote": None,  # å¯ä»¥ä»ç”¨æˆ·åå¥½æˆ–æ¨èç³»ç»Ÿè·å–
        "date": now.strftime("%Yå¹´%mæœˆ%dæ—¥"),
        "solarTerm": get_current_solar_term(),
    }

    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    # Status Layer
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    # ä» preferences æˆ– state è·å–ç­¾åˆ°çŠ¶æ€
    preferences = profile.get("preferences", {}) if profile else {}
    state = profile.get("state", {}) if profile else {}

    status = {
        "streak": preferences.get("streak", 0),
        "checkedIn": state.get("checked_in_today", False),
        "energy": preferences.get("energy", 80),
    }

    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    # Lifecoach Layer
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    # åŒ—ææ˜Ÿä¼˜å…ˆä» vibe.targetï¼Œå›é€€åˆ° skills.lifecoach
    north_star = vibe_target.get("north_star")
    if isinstance(north_star, dict):
        north_star = north_star.get("description") or north_star.get("vision")
    elif not north_star:
        north_star = lifecoach_data.get("north_star")
        if isinstance(north_star, dict):
            north_star = north_star.get("description") or north_star.get("vision")

    # å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ï¼ˆWeek Rocksï¼‰
    week_rocks_raw = vibe_target.get("goals", []) or lifecoach_data.get("week_rocks", [])
    week_rocks = []
    for i, rock in enumerate(week_rocks_raw[:5]):
        if isinstance(rock, dict):
            week_rocks.append({
                "id": rock.get("id", f"rock-{i}"),
                "text": rock.get("text") or rock.get("title") or rock.get("description", ""),
                "role": rock.get("role", ""),
                "completed": rock.get("completed", False),
            })
        elif isinstance(rock, str):
            week_rocks.append({
                "id": f"rock-{i}",
                "text": rock,
                "role": "",
                "completed": False,
            })

    # ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†ï¼ˆToday Leversï¼‰
    today_levers_raw = lifecoach_data.get("today_levers", []) or vibe_target.get("focus", {}).get("tasks", [])
    today_levers = []
    for i, lever in enumerate(today_levers_raw[:5]):
        if isinstance(lever, dict):
            today_levers.append({
                "id": lever.get("id", f"lever-{i}"),
                "text": lever.get("text") or lever.get("title") or lever.get("description", ""),
                "completed": lever.get("completed", False),
            })
        elif isinstance(lever, str):
            today_levers.append({
                "id": f"lever-{i}",

    # My Skills Layer (å…«å­—è¿åŠ¿ç­‰)
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    # å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ å…¶ä»–å·²è®¢é˜…çš„ Skill å¡ç‰‡

# Lever Toggle Endpoint
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@router.patch("/lever/{lever_id}")
async def toggle_lever(
    lever_id: str,
    current_user: CurrentUser = Depends(get_current_user)
):
    """
    åˆ‡æ¢ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€

    æ›´æ–° skills.lifecoach.today_levers ä¸­å¯¹åº”é¡¹çš„ completed çŠ¶æ€
    """
    user_id = current_user.user_id

    # è·å–å½“å‰ lifecoach æ•°æ®
    lifecoach_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach")
    today_levers = lifecoach_data.get("today_levers", [])

    # æ‰¾åˆ°å¹¶åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€
    found = False
    for lever in today_levers:
        if isinstance(lever, dict) and lever.get("id") == lever_id:
            lever["completed"] = not lever.get("completed", False)
            found = True
            break

    if not found:
        return {"success": False, "error": "Lever not found"}

    # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°
    lifecoach_data["today_levers"] = today_levers
    await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach", lifecoach_data)

    # è®¡ç®—è¿›åº¦
    completed_count = len([l for l in today_levers if isinstance(l, dict) and l.get("completed")])
    total_count = len(today_levers)

    return {
        "success": True,
        "data": {
            "lever": {"id": lever_id, "completed": not found or lever.get("completed", False)},
            "progress": {
                "completed": completed_count,
                "total": total_count,
                "percentage": round(completed_count / total_count * 100) if total_count > 0 else 0,
            },
            "allCompleted": completed_count == total_count,
        },
    }


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Rock Toggle Endpoint
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@router.patch("/rock/{rock_id}")
async def toggle_rock(
    rock_id: str,
    current_user: CurrentUser = Depends(get_current_user)
):
    """
    åˆ‡æ¢æœ¬å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€

    æ›´æ–° vibe.target.goals æˆ– skills.lifecoach.week_rocks ä¸­å¯¹åº”é¡¹çš„ completed çŠ¶æ€
    """
    user_id = current_user.user_id

    # ä¼˜å…ˆä» vibe.target è·å–
    vibe_target = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_vibe_target(user_id)
    goals = vibe_target.get("goals", [])

    # æ‰¾åˆ°å¹¶åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€
    found = False
    for goal in goals:
        if isinstance(goal, dict) and goal.get("id") == rock_id:
            goal["completed"] = not goal.get("completed", False)
            found = True
            break

    if found:
        # ä¿å­˜åˆ° vibe.target
        vibe_target["goals"] = goals
        await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_vibe_target(user_id, vibe_target)
    else:
        # å›é€€åˆ° lifecoach.week_rocks
        lifecoach_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach")
        week_rocks = lifecoach_data.get("week_rocks", [])

        for rock in week_rocks:
            if isinstance(rock, dict) and rock.get("id") == rock_id:
                rock["completed"] = not rock.get("completed", False)
                found = True
                break

        if found:
            lifecoach_data["week_rocks"] = week_rocks
            await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach", lifecoach_data)

    if not found:
        return {"success": False, "error": "Rock not found"}

    return {
        "success": True,
        "data": {
            "rockId": rock_id,
            "completed": True,  # å·²åˆ‡æ¢
        },
    }

   240â†’    def _calculate_hourly_energy(
   241â†’        self,
   242â†’        day_master: Element,
   243â†’        day_element: Element,
   244â†’        base_score: int,
   245â†’    ) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   246â†’        """
   247â†’        è®¡ç®— 24 å°æ—¶èƒ½é‡æ›²çº¿
   248â†’
   249â†’        åŸºäºäº”è¡Œç”Ÿå…‹å…³ç³»å’Œæ—¶è¾°èƒ½é‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼š
   250â†’        - å¯æ—¶ (5-7)ï¼šæœ¨æ—º
   251â†’        - å·³æ—¶ (9-11)ï¼šç«æ—º
   252â†’        - åˆæ—¶ (11-13)ï¼šç«æ—º
   253â†’        - ç”³æ—¶ (15-17)ï¼šé‡‘æ—º
   254â†’        - é…‰æ—¶ (17-19)ï¼šé‡‘æ—º
   255â†’        - å­æ—¶ (23-1)ï¼šæ°´æ—º
   256â†’        - ä¸‘æ—¶ (1-3)ï¼šåœŸæ—º
   257â†’        """
   258â†’        curve = []
   259â†’
   260â†’        # æ—¶è¾°å¯¹åº”å…ƒç´ 
   261â†’        hour_elements = {
   262â†’            1: Element.WATER, 3: Element.WATER,   # å­æ—¶ã€ä¸‘æ—¶
   263â†’            5: Element.WOOD, 7: Element.WOOD,     # å¯…æ—¶ã€å¯æ—¶
   264â†’            9: Element.FIRE, 11: Element.FIRE,    # è¾°æ—¶ã€å·³æ—¶
   265â†’            13: Element.FIRE, 15: Element.EARTH,  # åˆæ—¶ã€æœªæ—¶
   266â†’            17: Element.METAL, 19: Element.METAL, # ç”³æ—¶ã€é…‰æ—¶
   267â†’            21: Element.EARTH, 23: Element.WATER, # æˆŒæ—¶ã€äº¥æ—¶
   268â†’        }
   269â†’
   270â†’        for hour in range(0, 24, 2):  # æ¯ 2 å°æ—¶ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®ç‚¹
   271â†’            hour_element = hour_elements.get(hour + 1, Element.EARTH)
   272â†’
   273â†’            # è®¡ç®—è¯¥æ—¶è¾°çš„èƒ½é‡åŠ æˆ
   274â†’            if hour_element == day_element:
   275â†’                # å½“å‰æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ä¸ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ç›¸åŒï¼Œèƒ½é‡+10%
   276â†’                energy_boost = 10
   277â†’            elif ELEMENT_GENERATES.get(hour_element) == day_element:
   278â†’                # æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ç”Ÿä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡+5%
   279â†’                energy_boost = 5
   280â†’            elif ELEMENT_GENERATES.get(day_element) == hour_element:
   281â†’                # ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ç”Ÿæ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡-5%
   282â†’                energy_boost = -5
   283â†’            elif ELEMENT_CONTROLS.get(hour_element) == day_element:
   284â†’                # æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ å…‹ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡-10%
   285â†’                energy_boost = -10
   286â†’            else:
   287â†’                energy_boost = 0
   288â†’
   289â†’            hour_score = min(100, max(0, base_score + energy_boost))
   290â†’
   291â†’            curve.append({
   292â†’                "hour": hour,
   293â†’                "energy": hour_score,
   294â†’                "element": hour_element.value,
   295â†’            })
   296â†’
   297â†’        return curve
   298â†’

   311â†’        - è´¢å¯Œï¼šè´¢æ˜Ÿï¼ˆæˆ‘å…‹ï¼‰
   312â†’        - æ„Ÿæƒ…ï¼šå®˜æ˜Ÿï¼ˆå¥³å‘½å…‹æˆ‘ï¼‰ã€è´¢æ˜Ÿï¼ˆç”·å‘½æˆ‘å…‹ï¼‰
   313â†’        - å¥åº·ï¼šæ¯”åŠ«ï¼ˆåŒæˆ‘ï¼‰ã€å°æ˜Ÿï¼ˆç”Ÿæˆ‘ï¼‰

   333â†’        # æ„Ÿæƒ…è¿ï¼šå¼‚æ€§æ˜Ÿå¾—åŠ›ï¼ˆç®€åŒ–å¤„ç†ï¼‰
   334â†’        if influence in ["controls", "controlled_by"]:

   336â†’        else:

   338â†’

   340â†’        if influence in ["same", "generated_by"]:

   388â†’    async def get_inflection_points(self, profile: Dict[str, Any]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   389â†’        """è·å–è¿åŠ¿æ‹ç‚¹ (ç”¨äºäº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘)"""
   390â†’        identity = profile.get("identity", {})
   391â†’        birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
   392â†’        birth_date_str = birth_info.get("date", "")
   393â†’
   394â†’        if not birth_date_str:
   395â†’            return []
   396â†’
   397â†’        try:
   398â†’            birth_date = datetime.strptime(birth_date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").date()
   399â†’            birth_year = birth_date.year
   400â†’        except ValueError:
   401â†’            return []
   402â†’
   403â†’        day_master_element = self._get_day_master_element(profile)
   404â†’        gender = birth_info.get("gender", "unknown")
   405â†’
   406â†’        # è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿
   407â†’        cycles = self._calculate_major_cycles(
   408â†’            birth_year=birth_year,
   409â†’            day_master_element=day_master_element,
   410â†’            gender=gender,
   411â†’        )
   412â†’
   413â†’        # æå–æ‹ç‚¹
   414â†’        inflection_points = []
   415â†’        current_year = datetime.now().year
   416â†’
   417â†’        for i, cycle in enumerate(cycles):
   418â†’            if i > 0:
   419â†’                prev_cycle = cycles[i - 1]
   420â†’                significance = abs(cycle.fortune_score - prev_cycle.fortune_score) // 10
   421â†’
   422â†’                if significance >= 2:
   423â†’                    inflection_points.append({
   424â†’                        "year": cycle.start_year,
   425â†’                        "type": "major_cycle_change",
   426â†’                        "significance": min(significance, 10),
   427â†’                        "title": f"å¤§è¿äº¤æ¥ - è¿›å…¥ã€Œ{cycle.theme}ã€",
   428â†’                        "explanation": f"ä»ã€Œ{prev_cycle.theme}ã€è½¬æ¢åˆ°ã€Œ{cycle.theme}ã€é˜¶æ®µ",
   429â†’                        "is_past": cycle.start_year < current_year,
   430â†’                    })
   431â†’
   432â†’        return inflection_points
   433â†’
   434â†’    async def generate_kline_data(
   435â†’        self,
   436â†’        profile: Dict[str, Any],
   437â†’        year_range: tuple = None,
   438â†’    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   439â†’        """
   440â†’        ç”Ÿæˆ K-Line æ•°æ® (å®æ—¶è®¡ç®—ï¼Œä¸ç¼“å­˜)
   441â†’
   442â†’        Args:
   443â†’            profile: ç”¨æˆ·ç”»åƒ
   444â†’            year_range: (start_year, end_year)
   445â†’
   446â†’        Returns:
   447â†’            K-Line æ•°æ®å­—å…¸
   448â†’        """
   449â†’        identity = profile.get("identity", {})
   450â†’        birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
   451â†’        birth_date_str = birth_info.get("date", "")
   452â†’
   453â†’        if not birth_date_str:
   454â†’            return {"error": "No birth date"}
   455â†’
   456â†’        try:
   457â†’            birth_date = datetime.strptime(birth_date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").date()
   458â†’            birth_year = birth_date.year
   459â†’        except ValueError:
   460â†’            return {"error": "Invalid birth date"}
   461â†’
   462â†’        day_master_element = self._get_day_master_element(profile)
   463â†’        gender = birth_info.get("gender", "unknown")
   464â†’        current_year = datetime.now().year
   465â†’
   466â†’        # é»˜è®¤èŒƒå›´
   467â†’        if not year_range:
   468â†’            year_range = (birth_year, birth_year + 80)
   469â†’
   470â†’        # è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿
   471â†’        cycles = self._calculate_major_cycles(
   472â†’            birth_year=birth_year,
   473â†’            day_master_element=day_master_element,
   474â†’            gender=gender,
   475â†’        )
   476â†’
   477â†’        # ç”Ÿæˆæ•°æ®ç‚¹
   478â†’        data_points = []
   479â†’        for year in range(year_range[0], year_range[1] + 1):
   480â†’            # è·å–æµå¹´è¿åŠ¿
   481â†’            annual = await self.calculate_annual_fortune(profile, year)
   482â†’
   483â†’            # æ‰¾åˆ°å½“å‰å¹´ä»½æ‰€å±çš„å¤§è¿
   484â†’            cycle_score = 50
   485â†’            phase = None
   486â†’            for cycle in cycles:
   487â†’                if cycle.start_year <= year < cycle.end_year:
   488â†’                    cycle_score = cycle.fortune_score
   489â†’                    phase = cycle.phase.value
   490â†’                    break
   491â†’
   492â†’            # æ··åˆå¤§è¿å’Œæµå¹´åˆ†æ•°
   493â†’            blended_score = int(cycle_score * 0.6 + annual["score"] * 0.4)
   494â†’
   495â†’            data_points.append({
   496â†’                "year": year,
   497â†’                "score": blended_score,
   498â†’                "is_current": year == current_year,
   499â†’                "phase": phase,
   500â†’            })
   501â†’
   502â†’        # ç”Ÿæˆé˜¶æ®µ
   503â†’        phases = []
   504â†’        for cycle in cycles:
   505â†’            trend = self._determine_trend(cycle, cycles)
   506â†’            phases.append({
   507â†’                "start_year": cycle.start_year,
   508â†’                "end_year": cycle.end_year,
   509â†’                "phase": cycle.phase.value,
   510â†’                "label": cycle.theme,
   511â†’                "description": cycle.description,
   512â†’                "fortune_trend": trend,
   513â†’            })
   514â†’
   515â†’        # è·å–æ‹ç‚¹
   516â†’        inflection_points = await self.get_inflection_points(profile)
   517â†’
   518â†’        # å½“å‰é˜¶æ®µ
   519â†’        current_phase = None
   520â†’        for phase in phases:
   521â†’            if phase["start_year"] <= current_year < phase["end_year"]:
   522â†’                current_phase = phase
   523â†’                break
   524â†’
   525â†’        # ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ‹ç‚¹
   526â†’        next_inflection = None
   527â†’        for point in inflection_points:
   528â†’            if point["year"] > current_year:
   529â†’                next_inflection = point
   530â†’                break
   531â†’
   532â†’        return {
   533â†’            "id": str(uuid4()),
   534â†’            "data_points": data_points,
   535â†’            "phases": phases,
   536â†’            "inflection_points": inflection_points,
   537â†’            "current_year": current_year,
   538â†’            "current_phase": current_phase,
   539â†’            "next_inflection": next_inflection,
   540â†’            "now_summary": self._generate_now_summary(current_phase, current_year),
   541â†’            "next_summary": self._generate_next_summary(next_inflection),
   542â†’        }
   543â†’
   544â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   545â†’    # å†…éƒ¨æ–¹æ³•
   546â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   548â†’    def _get_day_master_element(self, profile: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:

   551â†’        skill_data = profile.get("skills", {}).get("bazi", {})
   552â†’        chart = skill_data.get("chart", {})

   554â†’
   555â†’        if day_master.get("element"):
   556â†’            return day_master["element"]

   558â†’        # å›é€€åˆ° birth_info (æ—§æ ¼å¼å…¼å®¹)

   563â†’    def _get_day_stem_index(self, d: date) -> int:
   564â†’        """è®¡ç®—æŸæ—¥çš„å¤©å¹²ç´¢å¼•"""
   565â†’        # ç®€åŒ–ç®—æ³•ï¼šåŸºäºå„’ç•¥æ—¥
   566â†’        jd = self._date_to_julian(d)
   567â†’        return (jd + 9) % 10
   568â†’
   569â†’    def _date_to_julian(self, d: date) -> int:
   570â†’        """æ—¥æœŸè½¬å„’ç•¥æ—¥ (ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ)"""
   571â†’        a = (14 - d.month) // 12
   572â†’        y = d.year + 4800 - a
   573â†’        m = d.month + 12 * a - 3
   574â†’        return d.day + (153 * m + 2) // 5 + 365 * y + y // 4 - y // 100 + y // 400 - 32045
   575â†’
   576â†’    def _calculate_major_cycles(
   577â†’        self,
   578â†’        birth_year: int,
   579â†’        day_master_element: str,
   580â†’        gender: str = "unknown",
   581â†’        start_age: int = 5,
   582â†’    ) -> List[MajorCycle]:
   583â†’        """è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿å‘¨æœŸ"""
   584â†’        cycles = []
   585â†’        day_element = Element(day_master_element) if day_master_element else Element.WOOD
   586â†’
   587â†’        # èµ·å§‹å¤©å¹²ç´¢å¼•
   588â†’        stem_index = (birth_year - 4) % 10
   589â†’
   590â†’        # æ ¹æ®æ€§åˆ«ç¡®å®šæ–¹å‘
   591â†’        direction = 1 if gender == "male" else -1
   592â†’
   593â†’        cycle_start = birth_year + start_age
   594â†’        while cycle_start < birth_year + 85:
   595â†’            cycle_end = cycle_start + 10
   596â†’
   597â†’            # è·å–å½“å‰å‘¨æœŸçš„å¤©å¹²
   598â†’            stem_index = (stem_index + direction) % 10
   599â†’            stem_name, element, polarity = self.STEMS[stem_index]
   600â†’
   601â†’            # ç¡®å®šé˜¶æ®µ
   602â†’            phase = self._determine_phase(day_element, element, len(cycles))
   603â†’
   604â†’            # è®¡ç®—åˆ†æ•°
   605â†’            score = self._calculate_cycle_score(day_element, element)
   606â†’
   607â†’            # ç”Ÿæˆæè¿°
   608â†’            description = self._generate_cycle_description(element, phase)
   609â†’
   610â†’            cycles.append(MajorCycle(
   611â†’                start_year=cycle_start,
   612â†’                end_year=cycle_end,
   613â†’                element=element,
   614â†’                polarity=polarity,
   615â†’                phase=phase,
   616â†’                theme=self.PHASE_THEMES[phase],
   617â†’                description=description,
   618â†’                fortune_score=score,
   619â†’            ))
   620â†’
   621â†’            cycle_start = cycle_end
   622â†’
   623â†’        return cycles
   624â†’
   625â†’    def _determine_phase(
   626â†’        self,
   627â†’        day_element: Element,
   628â†’        cycle_element: Element,
   629â†’        cycle_index: int,
   630â†’    ) -> FortunePhase:
   631â†’        """ç¡®å®šå¤§è¿é˜¶æ®µ"""
   632â†’        if cycle_element == day_element:
   633â†’            return FortunePhase.PEAK
   634â†’        elif ELEMENT_GENERATES[cycle_element] == day_element:
   635â†’            return FortunePhase.ACCUMULATION
   636â†’        elif ELEMENT_GENERATES[day_element] == cycle_element:
   637â†’            return FortunePhase.BREAKTHROUGH
   638â†’        elif ELEMENT_CONTROLS[cycle_element] == day_element:
   639â†’            return FortunePhase.ADJUSTMENT
   640â†’        elif ELEMENT_CONTROLS[day_element] == cycle_element:
   641â†’            return FortunePhase.TRANSITION
   642â†’        else:
   643â†’            return FortunePhase.FOUNDATION
   644â†’
   645â†’    def _calculate_cycle_score(
   646â†’        self,
   647â†’        day_element: Element,
   648â†’        cycle_element: Element,
   649â†’    ) -> int:
   650â†’        """è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿åˆ†æ•°"""
   651â†’        score = 60
   652â†’
   653â†’        if cycle_element == day_element:
   654â†’            score += 20
   655â†’        elif ELEMENT_GENERATES[cycle_element] == day_element:

    67â†’
    68â†’# Stem to Element mapping
    69â†’STEM_ELEMENT = {
    70â†’    "ç”²": Element.WOOD, "ä¹™": Element.WOOD,

    76â†’
    77â†’# Branch hidden stems (åœ°æ”¯è—å¹²)
    78â†’BRANCH_HIDDEN_STEMS = {
    79â†’    "å­": ["ç™¸"],
    80â†’    "ä¸‘": ["å·±", "ç™¸", "è¾›"],
    81â†’    "å¯…": ["ç”²", "ä¸™", "æˆŠ"],

    94â†’@dataclass
    95â†’class Pillar:
    96â†’    """A single pillar (æŸ±) with stem and branch"""
    97â†’    stem: str
    98â†’    branch: str
    99â†’    stem_element: str = ""
   100â†’    hidden_stems: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)

   102â†’    def __post_init__(self):

   162â†’class BaziCalculator:
   163â†’    """
   164â†’    Bazi (Four Pillars) Calculator
   165â†’
   166â†’    Usage:
   167â†’        calculator = BaziCalculator()
   168â†’        chart = calculator.calculate(
   169â†’            birth_date="1990-05-15",
   170â†’            birth_time="08:00",
   171â†’            gender="male"
   172â†’        )
   173â†’    """
   174â†’
   175â†’    # Day Master descriptions
   176â†’    DAY_MASTER_DESC = {
   177â†’        "ç”²": "ç”²æœ¨æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚å‚å¤©å¤§æ ‘ï¼Œæ­£ç›´åˆšå¼ºï¼Œé‡è§†æˆé•¿ä¸åŸåˆ™ã€‚",
   178â†’        "ä¹™": "ä¹™æœ¨æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚èŠ±è‰è—¤è”“ï¼ŒæŸ”éŸ§çµæ´»ï¼Œå–„äºé€‚åº”ç¯å¢ƒã€‚",
   179â†’        "ä¸™": "ä¸™ç«æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚å¤ªé˜³ä¹‹ç«ï¼Œçƒ­æƒ…å¼€æœ—ï¼Œå…·æœ‰é¢†å¯¼é­…åŠ›ã€‚",
   180â†’        "ä¸": "ä¸ç«æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚çƒ›å…‰æ˜Ÿç«ï¼Œæ¸©æŸ”ç»†è…»ï¼Œæ´å¯ŸåŠ›å¼ºã€‚",
   181â†’        "æˆŠ": "æˆŠåœŸæ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚é«˜å±±å¤§åœ°ï¼Œç¨³é‡åŒ…å®¹ï¼Œä¿¡å®ˆæ‰¿è¯ºã€‚",
   182â†’        "å·±": "å·±åœŸæ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚ç”°å›­æ²ƒåœŸï¼ŒåŠ¡å®è°¨æ…ï¼Œå–„äºè€•è€˜ã€‚",
   183â†’        "åºš": "åºšé‡‘æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚åˆ€å‰‘å™¨çš¿ï¼Œæœæ–­åˆšæ¯…ï¼Œé‡è§†æ•ˆç‡ã€‚",
   184â†’        "è¾›": "è¾›é‡‘æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚ç ç‰é¦–é¥°ï¼Œç²¾è‡´æ•æ„Ÿï¼Œè¿½æ±‚å®Œç¾ã€‚",
   185â†’        "å£¬": "å£¬æ°´æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚æ±Ÿæ²³å¤§æµ·ï¼Œæ™ºæ…§æ·±æ²‰ï¼Œå˜é€šçµæ´»ã€‚",
   186â†’        "ç™¸": "ç™¸æ°´æ—¥ä¸»ï¼Œå¦‚é›¨éœ²æºªæµï¼Œæ¸©æ¶¦å†…æ•›ï¼Œç›´è§‰æ•é”ã€‚",
   187â†’    }
   188â†’
   189â†’    def __init__(self):
   190â†’        if not LUNAR_AVAILABLE:
   191â†’            logger.warning("lunar-python not available, calculations will be limited")
   192â†’
   193â†’    def calculate(
   194â†’        self,
   195â†’        birth_date: str,  # "YYYY-MM-DD"
   196â†’        birth_time: str = "12:00",  # "HH:MM"
   197â†’        gender: str = "unknown"
   198â†’    ) -> BaziChart:
   199â†’        """
   200â†’        Calculate complete Bazi chart from birth information.
   201â†’
   202â†’        Args:
   203â†’            birth_date: Date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
   204â†’            birth_time: Time in "HH:MM" format (default noon if unknown)
   205â†’            gender: "male", "female", or "unknown"
   206â†’
   207â†’        Returns:
   208â†’            BaziChart with all calculations
   209â†’        """
   210â†’        if not LUNAR_AVAILABLE:
   211â†’            raise RuntimeError("lunar-python not installed. Install with: pip install lunar-python")
   212â†’
   213â†’        try:
   214â†’            # Parse date and time
   215â†’            year, month, day = map(int, birth_date.split("-"))
   216â†’            hour, minute = map(int, birth_time.split(":"))
   217â†’
   218â†’            # Create Solar date
   219â†’            solar = Solar.fromYmdHms(year, month, day, hour, minute, 0)
   220â†’            lunar = solar.getLunar()
   221â†’
   222â†’            # Get Eight Characters (å››æŸ±å…«å­—)
   223â†’            eight_char = lunar.getEightChar()
   224â†’
   225â†’            # Build four pillars
   226â†’            four_pillars = {
   227â†’                "year": Pillar(stem=eight_char.getYearGan(), branch=eight_char.getYearZhi()),
   228â†’                "month": Pillar(stem=eight_char.getMonthGan(), branch=eight_char.getMonthZhi()),
   229â†’                "day": Pillar(stem=eight_char.getDayGan(), branch=eight_char.getDayZhi()),
   230â†’                "hour": Pillar(stem=eight_char.getTimeGan(), branch=eight_char.getTimeZhi()),
   231â†’            }
   232â†’
   233â†’            # Get day master
   234â†’            day_stem = eight_char.getDayGan()
   235â†’            day_master = DayMaster(
   236â†’                stem=day_stem,
   237â†’                element=STEM_ELEMENT.get(day_stem, Element.WOOD).value,
   238â†’                polarity="yang" if day_stem in "ç”²ä¸™æˆŠåºšå£¬" else "yin",
   239â†’                description=self.DAY_MASTER_DESC.get(day_stem, ""),
   240â†’            )
   241â†’
   242â†’            # Calculate five elements distribution
   243â†’            five_elements = self._count_elements(four_pillars)
   244â†’
   245â†’            # Calculate ten gods
   246â†’            ten_gods = self._calculate_ten_gods(eight_char, day_stem)
   247â†’
   248â†’            # Determine pattern
   249â†’            pattern = self._determine_pattern(eight_char, day_master, ten_gods)
   250â†’
   251â†’            return BaziChart(
   252â†’                birth_info={
   253â†’                    "date": birth_date,
   254â†’                    "time": birth_time,
   255â†’                    "gender": gender,
   256â†’                    "lunar_date": f"{lunar.getYearInChinese()}å¹´{lunar.getMonthInChinese()}æœˆ{lunar.getDayInChinese()}",
   257â†’                },
   258â†’                four_pillars=four_pillars,
   259â†’                day_master=day_master,
   260â†’                five_elements=five_elements,
   261â†’                ten_gods=ten_gods,
   262â†’                pattern=pattern,
   263â†’            )
   264â†’
   265â†’        except Exception as e:
   266â†’            logger.error(f"Bazi calculation failed: {e}")
   267â†’            raise RuntimeError(f"Bazi calculation failed: {e}") from e
   268â†’
   269â†’    def _count_elements(self, pillars: Dict[str, Pillar]) -> Dict[str, int]:
   270â†’        """Count five elements from all stems and branches"""
   271â†’        counts = {e.value: 0 for e in Element}
   272â†’
   273â†’        for pillar in pillars.values():
   274â†’            # Count stem element
   275â†’            if pillar.stem in STEM_ELEMENT:
   276â†’                counts[STEM_ELEMENT[pillar.stem].value] += 1
   277â†’
   278â†’            # Count hidden stem elements
   279â†’            for hidden in pillar.hidden_stems:
   280â†’                if hidden in STEM_ELEMENT:
   281â†’                    counts[STEM_ELEMENT[hidden].value] += 0.5  # Hidden stems count less
   282â†’
   283â†’        # Round to integers
   284â†’        return {k: int(v) for k, v in counts.items()}

   286â†’    def _calculate_ten_gods(self, eight_char, day_stem: str) -> List[TenGod]:
   287â†’        """Calculate ten gods relationships"""
   288â†’        ten_gods = []
   289â†’
   290â†’        # This is a simplified implementation
   291â†’        # Full implementation would use the lunar-python library's built-in methods
   292â†’        try:
   293â†’            # Get month stem ten god
   294â†’            month_gan = eight_char.getMonthGan()
   295â†’            ten_god_name = eight_char.getMonthShiShenGan()
   296â†’            if ten_god_name:
   297â†’                ten_gods.append(TenGod(
   298â†’                    name=ten_god_name,
   299â†’                    stem=month_gan,
   300â†’                    pillar="month",
   301â†’                ))
   302â†’
   303â†’            # Get year stem ten god
   304â†’            year_gan = eight_char.getYearGan()
   305â†’            ten_god_name = eight_char.getYearShiShenGan()
   306â†’            if ten_god_name:
   307â†’                ten_gods.append(TenGod(
   308â†’                    name=ten_god_name,
   309â†’                    stem=year_gan,
   310â†’                    pillar="year",
   311â†’                ))
   312â†’
   313â†’        except Exception as e:
   314â†’            logger.warning(f"Ten gods calculation error: {e}")
   315â†’
   316â†’        return ten_gods
   317â†’
   318â†’    def _determine_pattern(
   319â†’        self,

   323â†’    ) -> Dict[str, str]:
   324â†’        """Determine the pattern/structure (æ ¼å±€)"""
   325â†’        # This is a simplified implementation
   326â†’        # Full pattern determination is very complex
   327â†’        try:
   328â†’            # Check for common patterns based on month branch ten god
   329â†’            month_ten_god = next((g for g in ten_gods if g.pillar == "month"), None)
   330â†’            if month_ten_god:
   331â†’                pattern_name = f"{month_ten_god.name}æ ¼"
   332â†’                return {
   333â†’                    "name": pattern_name,
   334â†’                    "description": f"æœˆä»¤é€å‡º{month_ten_god.name}ï¼Œä»¥{month_ten_god.name}ä¸ºç”¨ç¥ã€‚",
   335â†’                }
   336â†’        except Exception:
   337â†’            pass
   338â†’
   339â†’        return {
   340â†’            "name": "æ™®é€šæ ¼å±€",
   341â†’            "description": "éœ€è¦ç»¼åˆåˆ†æå…«å­—æ•´ä½“æ¥ç¡®å®šæ ¼å±€ã€‚",
   342â†’        }
   343â†’
   344â†’
   345â†’# Convenience function
   346â†’def calculate_bazi(
   347â†’    birth_date: str,
   348â†’    birth_time: str = "12:00",
   349â†’    gender: str = "unknown"
   350â†’) -> dict:
   351â†’    """
   352â†’    Calculate Bazi chart and return as dict.
   353â†’
   354â†’    Args:

   357â†’        gender: "male", "female", or "unknown"
   358â†’
   359â†’    Returns:

   361â†’    """

   363â†’    chart = calculator.calculate(birth_date, birth_time, gender)

   269â†’# Lever Toggle Endpoint
   270â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   274â†’    lever_id: str,

   277â†’    """
   278â†’    åˆ‡æ¢ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†å®ŒæˆçŠ¶æ€

   280â†’    æ›´æ–° skills.lifecoach.today_levers ä¸­å¯¹åº”é¡¹çš„ completed çŠ¶æ€

   283â†’

   286â†’    today_levers = lifecoach_data.get("today_levers", [])
   287â†’
   288â†’    # æ‰¾åˆ°å¹¶åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€
   289â†’    found = False

   292â†’            lever["completed"] = not lever.get("completed", False)
   293â†’            found = True
   294â†’            break
   295â†’
   296â†’    if not found:
   297â†’        return {"success": False, "error": "Lever not found"}
   298â†’
   299â†’    # ä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°

   301â†’    await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_id, "lifecoach", lifecoach_data)
   302â†’
   303â†’    # è®¡ç®—è¿›åº¦
   304â†’    completed_count = len([l for l in today_levers if isinstance(l, dict) and l.get("completed")])
   305â†’    total_count = len(today_levers)
   306â†’
   307â†’    return {
   308â†’        "success": True,
   309â†’        "data": {
   310â†’            "lever": {"id": lever_id, "completed": not found or lever.get("completed", False)},
   311â†’            "progress": {

   313â†’                "total": total_count,
   314â†’                "percentage": round(completed_count / total_count * 100) if total_count > 0 else 0,
   315â†’            },
   316â†’            "allCompleted": completed_count == total_count,
   317â†’        },
   318â†’    }

   240â†’    def _calculate_hourly_energy(
   241â†’        self,
   242â†’        day_master: Element,
   243â†’        day_element: Element,
   244â†’        base_score: int,
   245â†’    ) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   246â†’        """
   247â†’        è®¡ç®— 24 å°æ—¶èƒ½é‡æ›²çº¿
   248â†’
   249â†’        åŸºäºäº”è¡Œç”Ÿå…‹å…³ç³»å’Œæ—¶è¾°èƒ½é‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼š
   250â†’        - å¯æ—¶ (5-7)ï¼šæœ¨æ—º
   251â†’        - å·³æ—¶ (9-11)ï¼šç«æ—º
   252â†’        - åˆæ—¶ (11-13)ï¼šç«æ—º
   253â†’        - ç”³æ—¶ (15-17)ï¼šé‡‘æ—º
   254â†’        - é…‰æ—¶ (17-19)ï¼šé‡‘æ—º
   255â†’        - å­æ—¶ (23-1)ï¼šæ°´æ—º
   256â†’        - ä¸‘æ—¶ (1-3)ï¼šåœŸæ—º
   257â†’        """
   258â†’        curve = []
   259â†’
   260â†’        # æ—¶è¾°å¯¹åº”å…ƒç´ 
   261â†’        hour_elements = {
   262â†’            1: Element.WATER, 3: Element.WATER,   # å­æ—¶ã€ä¸‘æ—¶
   263â†’            5: Element.WOOD, 7: Element.WOOD,     # å¯…æ—¶ã€å¯æ—¶
   264â†’            9: Element.FIRE, 11: Element.FIRE,    # è¾°æ—¶ã€å·³æ—¶
   265â†’            13: Element.FIRE, 15: Element.EARTH,  # åˆæ—¶ã€æœªæ—¶
   266â†’            17: Element.METAL, 19: Element.METAL, # ç”³æ—¶ã€é…‰æ—¶
   267â†’            21: Element.EARTH, 23: Element.WATER, # æˆŒæ—¶ã€äº¥æ—¶
   268â†’        }
   269â†’
   270â†’        for hour in range(0, 24, 2):  # æ¯ 2 å°æ—¶ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®ç‚¹
   271â†’            hour_element = hour_elements.get(hour + 1, Element.EARTH)
   272â†’
   273â†’            # è®¡ç®—è¯¥æ—¶è¾°çš„èƒ½é‡åŠ æˆ
   274â†’            if hour_element == day_element:
   275â†’                # å½“å‰æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ä¸ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ç›¸åŒï¼Œèƒ½é‡+10%
   276â†’                energy_boost = 10
   277â†’            elif ELEMENT_GENERATES.get(hour_element) == day_element:
   278â†’                # æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ç”Ÿä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡+5%
   279â†’                energy_boost = 5
   280â†’            elif ELEMENT_GENERATES.get(day_element) == hour_element:
   281â†’                # ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ç”Ÿæ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡-5%
   282â†’                energy_boost = -5
   283â†’            elif ELEMENT_CONTROLS.get(hour_element) == day_element:
   284â†’                # æ—¶è¾°å…ƒç´ å…‹ä»Šæ—¥å…ƒç´ ï¼Œèƒ½é‡-10%
   285â†’                energy_boost = -10
   286â†’            else:
   287â†’                energy_boost = 0
   288â†’
   289â†’            hour_score = min(100, max(0, base_score + energy_boost))
   290â†’
   291â†’            curve.append({
   292â†’                "hour": hour,
   293â†’                "energy": hour_score,
   294â†’                "element": hour_element.value,
   295â†’            })
   296â†’
   297â†’        return curve
   298â†’

   307â†’        è®¡ç®—ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–é¢†åŸŸè¯„åˆ†ï¼ˆäº‹ä¸š/è´¢å¯Œ/æ„Ÿæƒ…/å¥åº·ï¼‰
   308â†’
   309â†’        åŸºäºäº”è¡Œå¯¹åº”å…³ç³»ï¼š
   310â†’        - äº‹ä¸šï¼šå°æ˜Ÿï¼ˆç”Ÿæˆ‘ï¼‰ã€å®˜æ˜Ÿï¼ˆå…‹æˆ‘ï¼‰
   311â†’        - è´¢å¯Œï¼šè´¢æ˜Ÿï¼ˆæˆ‘å…‹ï¼‰
   312â†’        - æ„Ÿæƒ…ï¼šå®˜æ˜Ÿï¼ˆå¥³å‘½å…‹æˆ‘ï¼‰ã€è´¢æ˜Ÿï¼ˆç”·å‘½æˆ‘å…‹ï¼‰
   313â†’        - å¥åº·ï¼šæ¯”åŠ«ï¼ˆåŒæˆ‘ï¼‰ã€å°æ˜Ÿï¼ˆç”Ÿæˆ‘ï¼‰
   314â†’        """
   315â†’        scores = {}

   332â†’
   333â†’        # æ„Ÿæƒ…è¿ï¼šå¼‚æ€§æ˜Ÿå¾—åŠ›ï¼ˆç®€åŒ–å¤„ç†ï¼‰
   334â†’        if influence in ["controls", "controlled_by"]:
   335â†’            scores["romance"] = min(100, base_score + 5)
   336â†’        else:
   337â†’            scores["romance"] = base_score
   338â†’
   339â†’        # å¥åº·è¿ï¼šå°æ¯”å¾—åŠ›
   340â†’        if influence in ["same", "generated_by"]:
   341â†’            scores["health"] = min(100, base_score + 10)
   342â†’        else:
   343â†’            scores["health"] = base_score
   344â†’

   388â†’    async def get_inflection_points(self, profile: Dict[str, Any]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   389â†’        """è·å–è¿åŠ¿æ‹ç‚¹ (ç”¨äºäº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘)"""
   390â†’        identity = profile.get("identity", {})
   391â†’        birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
   392â†’        birth_date_str = birth_info.get("date", "")
   393â†’
   394â†’        if not birth_date_str:
   395â†’            return []
   396â†’
   397â†’        try:
   398â†’            birth_date = datetime.strptime(birth_date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").date()
   399â†’            birth_year = birth_date.year
   400â†’        except ValueError:
   401â†’            return []
   402â†’
   403â†’        day_master_element = self._get_day_master_element(profile)
   404â†’        gender = birth_info.get("gender", "unknown")
   405â†’
   406â†’        # è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿
   407â†’        cycles = self._calculate_major_cycles(
   408â†’            birth_year=birth_year,
   409â†’            day_master_element=day_master_element,
   410â†’            gender=gender,
   411â†’        )
   412â†’
   413â†’        # æå–æ‹ç‚¹
   414â†’        inflection_points = []
   415â†’        current_year = datetime.now().year
   416â†’
   417â†’        for i, cycle in enumerate(cycles):
   418â†’            if i > 0:
   419â†’                prev_cycle = cycles[i - 1]
   420â†’                significance = abs(cycle.fortune_score - prev_cycle.fortune_score) // 10
   421â†’
   422â†’                if significance >= 2:
   423â†’                    inflection_points.append({
   424â†’                        "year": cycle.start_year,
   425â†’                        "type": "major_cycle_change",
   426â†’                        "significance": min(significance, 10),
   427â†’                        "title": f"å¤§è¿äº¤æ¥ - è¿›å…¥ã€Œ{cycle.theme}ã€",
   428â†’                        "explanation": f"ä»ã€Œ{prev_cycle.theme}ã€è½¬æ¢åˆ°ã€Œ{cycle.theme}ã€é˜¶æ®µ",
   429â†’                        "is_past": cycle.start_year < current_year,
   430â†’                    })
   431â†’
   432â†’        return inflection_points
   433â†’
   434â†’    async def generate_kline_data(
   435â†’        self,
   436â†’        profile: Dict[str, Any],
   437â†’        year_range: tuple = None,
   438â†’    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   439â†’        """
   440â†’        ç”Ÿæˆ K-Line æ•°æ® (å®æ—¶è®¡ç®—ï¼Œä¸ç¼“å­˜)
   441â†’
   442â†’        Args:
   443â†’            profile: ç”¨æˆ·ç”»åƒ
   444â†’            year_range: (start_year, end_year)
   445â†’
   446â†’        Returns:
   447â†’            K-Line æ•°æ®å­—å…¸
   448â†’        """
   449â†’        identity = profile.get("identity", {})
   450â†’        birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
   451â†’        birth_date_str = birth_info.get("date", "")
   452â†’
   453â†’        if not birth_date_str:
   454â†’            return {"error": "No birth date"}
   455â†’
   456â†’        try:
   457â†’            birth_date = datetime.strptime(birth_date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").date()
   458â†’            birth_year = birth_date.year
   459â†’        except ValueError:
   460â†’            return {"error": "Invalid birth date"}
   461â†’
   462â†’        day_master_element = self._get_day_master_element(profile)
   463â†’        gender = birth_info.get("gender", "unknown")
   464â†’        current_year = datetime.now().year
   465â†’
   466â†’        # é»˜è®¤èŒƒå›´
   467â†’        if not year_range:
   468â†’            year_range = (birth_year, birth_year + 80)
   469â†’
   470â†’        # è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿
   471â†’        cycles = self._calculate_major_cycles(
   472â†’            birth_year=birth_year,
   473â†’            day_master_element=day_master_element,
   474â†’            gender=gender,
   475â†’        )
   476â†’
   477â†’        # ç”Ÿæˆæ•°æ®ç‚¹
   478â†’        data_points = []
   479â†’        for year in range(year_range[0], year_range[1] + 1):
   480â†’            # è·å–æµå¹´è¿åŠ¿
   481â†’            annual = await self.calculate_annual_fortune(profile, year)
   482â†’
   483â†’            # æ‰¾åˆ°å½“å‰å¹´ä»½æ‰€å±çš„å¤§è¿
   484â†’            cycle_score = 50
   485â†’            phase = None
   486â†’            for cycle in cycles:
   487â†’                if cycle.start_year <= year < cycle.end_year:
   488â†’                    cycle_score = cycle.fortune_score
   489â†’                    phase = cycle.phase.value
   490â†’                    break
   491â†’
   492â†’            # æ··åˆå¤§è¿å’Œæµå¹´åˆ†æ•°
   493â†’            blended_score = int(cycle_score * 0.6 + annual["score"] * 0.4)
   494â†’
   495â†’            data_points.append({
   496â†’                "year": year,
   497â†’                "score": blended_score,
   498â†’                "is_current": year == current_year,
   499â†’                "phase": phase,
   500â†’            })
   501â†’
   502â†’        # ç”Ÿæˆé˜¶æ®µ
   503â†’        phases = []
   504â†’        for cycle in cycles:
   505â†’            trend = self._determine_trend(cycle, cycles)
   506â†’            phases.append({
   507â†’                "start_year": cycle.start_year,
   508â†’                "end_year": cycle.end_year,
   509â†’                "phase": cycle.phase.value,
   510â†’                "label": cycle.theme,
   511â†’                "description": cycle.description,
   512â†’                "fortune_trend": trend,
   513â†’            })
   514â†’
   515â†’        # è·å–æ‹ç‚¹
   516â†’        inflection_points = await self.get_inflection_points(profile)
   517â†’
   518â†’        # å½“å‰é˜¶æ®µ
   519â†’        current_phase = None
   520â†’        for phase in phases:
   521â†’            if phase["start_year"] <= current_year < phase["end_year"]:
   522â†’                current_phase = phase
   523â†’                break
   524â†’
   525â†’        # ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ‹ç‚¹
   526â†’        next_inflection = None
   527â†’        for point in inflection_points:
   528â†’            if point["year"] > current_year:
   529â†’                next_inflection = point
   530â†’                break
   531â†’
   532â†’        return {
   533â†’            "id": str(uuid4()),
   534â†’            "data_points": data_points,
   535â†’            "phases": phases,
   536â†’            "inflection_points": inflection_points,
   537â†’            "current_year": current_year,
   538â†’            "current_phase": current_phase,
   539â†’            "next_inflection": next_inflection,
   540â†’            "now_summary": self._generate_now_summary(current_phase, current_year),
   541â†’            "next_summary": self._generate_next_summary(next_inflection),
   542â†’        }
   543â†’
   544â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   545â†’    # å†…éƒ¨æ–¹æ³•
   546â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   563â†’    def _get_day_stem_index(self, d: date) -> int:
   564â†’        """è®¡ç®—æŸæ—¥çš„å¤©å¹²ç´¢å¼•"""
   565â†’        # ç®€åŒ–ç®—æ³•ï¼šåŸºäºå„’ç•¥æ—¥
   566â†’        jd = self._date_to_julian(d)
   567â†’        return (jd + 9) % 10
   568â†’
   569â†’    def _date_to_julian(self, d: date) -> int:
   570â†’        """æ—¥æœŸè½¬å„’ç•¥æ—¥ (ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ)"""
   571â†’        a = (14 - d.month) // 12
   572â†’        y = d.year + 4800 - a
   573â†’        m = d.month + 12 * a - 3
   574â†’        return d.day + (153 * m + 2) // 5 + 365 * y + y // 4 - y // 100 + y // 400 - 32045
   575â†’
   576â†’    def _calculate_major_cycles(
   577â†’        self,
   578â†’        birth_year: int,
   579â†’        day_master_element: str,
   580â†’        gender: str = "unknown",
   581â†’        start_age: int = 5,
   582â†’    ) -> List[MajorCycle]:
   583â†’        """è®¡ç®—å¤§è¿å‘¨æœŸ"""
   584â†’        cycles = []
   585â†’        day_element = Element(day_master_element) if day_master_element else Element.WOOD
   586â†’
   587â†’        # èµ·å§‹å¤©å¹²ç´¢å¼•
   588â†’        stem_index = (birth_year - 4) % 10
   589â†’
   590â†’        # æ ¹æ®æ€§åˆ«ç¡®å®šæ–¹å‘
   591â†’        direction = 1 if gender == "male" else -1
   592â†’
   593â†’        cycle_start = birth_year + start_age
   594â†’        while cycle_start < birth_year + 85:
   595â†’            cycle_end = cycle_start + 10
   596â†’
   597â†’            # è·å–å½“å‰å‘¨æœŸçš„å¤©å¹²
   598â†’            stem_index = (stem_index + direction) % 10
   599â†’            stem_name, element, polarity = self.STEMS[stem_index]
   600â†’
   601â†’            # ç¡®å®šé˜¶æ®µ
   602â†’            phase = self._determine_phase(day_element, element, len(cycles))
   603â†’
   604â†’            # è®¡ç®—åˆ†æ•°
   605â†’            score = self._calculate_cycle_score(day_element, element)
   606â†’
   607â†’            # ç”Ÿæˆæè¿°
   608â†’            description = self._generate_cycle_description(element, phase)
   609â†’
   610â†’            cycles.append(MajorCycle(
   611â†’                start_year=cycle_start,
   612â†’                end_year=cycle_end,
   613â†’                element=element,
   614â†’                polarity=polarity,
   615â†’                phase=phase,
   616â†’                theme=self.PHASE_THEMES[phase],

    95â†’def deep_merge(base: Dict, update: Dict) -> Dict:
    96â†’    """
    97â†’    æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—å…¸
    98â†’
    99â†’    è§„åˆ™ï¼š
   100â†’    - å¦‚æœ update ä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯ dictï¼Œé€’å½’åˆå¹¶
   101â†’    - å¦‚æœ update ä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯ Noneï¼Œåˆ é™¤è¯¥é”®
   102â†’    - å¦åˆ™ï¼Œupdate çš„å€¼è¦†ç›– base
   103â†’    """
   104â†’    result = base.copy()
   105â†’    for key, value in update.items():
   106â†’        if value is None:
   107â†’            # None è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ é™¤è¯¥é”®
   108â†’            result.pop(key, None)
   109â†’        elif key in result and isinstance(result[key], dict) and isinstance(value, dict):
   110â†’            # é€’å½’åˆå¹¶åµŒå¥—å­—å…¸
   111â†’            result[key] = deep_merge(result[key], value)
   112â†’        else:
   113â†’            # è¦†ç›–å€¼
   114â†’            result[key] = value
   115â†’    return result
   116â†’

  1430â†’        timeline = timeline[:max_items]

  2039â†’    @staticmethod

  2046â†’        """
  2047â†’        æ›´æ–° Skill çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ï¼‰
  2048â†’
  2049â†’        ä½¿ç”¨ PostgreSQL || æ“ä½œç¬¦è¿›è¡Œæ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ï¼Œä¸ä¼šè¦†ç›–æœªæŒ‡å®šçš„å­—æ®µ

  2056â†’        """
  2057â†’        exists = await fetchval(
  2058â†’            "SELECT 1 FROM unified_profiles WHERE user_id = $1",
  2059â†’            user_id
  2060â†’        )
  2061â†’
  2062â†’        if exists:
  2063â†’            # ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set + || è¿›è¡Œæ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶
  2064â†’            await execute(
  2065â†’                """UPDATE unified_profiles

  2072â†’                           ),

  2074â†’                           COALESCE(profile -> 'skills' -> $2::text, '{}'::jsonb)
  2075â†’                       ),
  2076â†’                       ARRAY['skills', $2::text, $3::text],
  2077â†’                       COALESCE(profile -> 'skills' -> $2::text -> $3::text, '{}'::jsonb) || $4::jsonb
